definitions.definition: A person or thing that takes the place of another; a substitute .

examples: The replacement of that broken light-bulb will have to wait until I can buy a new one.

definitions.definition: The removal of an edge of crystal , by one plane or more.

main_definition: A person or thing that takes the place of another; a substitute .
secondary_definitions: The removal of an edge of crystal , by one plane or more.
